radiographic_examinations.findings: 6-mm lung nodule with an otherwise negative workup.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A few months later, 2 new pulmonary lesions were noted on chest computed tomography scan.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Recurrence in thoracoscopy scars; evidence of rapid progression with development of large masses.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Disease progressed rapidly with development of large masses along the left chest wall, on the scalp, in both lungs, and within the abdomen.
Lactate dehydrogenase level had increased significantly to 7776 U/L.
